'''Eamund the Fox''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Eamund the Fox is a hitman sent by the council of captains to silence the Watcher, to prevent [Jacob Harker](/jacobHarker/) from coming out of retirement.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =[A Tidy Performance](/aTidyPerformance/)
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [A Tidy Performance](/aTidyPerformance/): He attacks you after you secure the wizard's freedom.
